text:
Medications
                
Some drugs can interfere with thyroid hormone production and lead to hypothyroidism, including
                
- amiodarone, a heart medication  - interferon alpha, a cancer medication  - lithium, a bipolar disorder medication  - interleukin-2, a kidney cancer medication",NIDDK,Hypothyroidism
What are the symptoms of Hypothyroidism ?,"Hypothyroidism has many symptoms that can vary from person to person. Some common symptoms of hypothyroidism are
